references: H. W. Gould, A class of binomial sums and a series transformation, Utilitas Math., 45 (1994), 71-83.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(0) = 1, a(n) = (2^(2*n)*a(n - 1)*Gamma(n + 1/2))/(sqrt(Pi)*Gamma(n + 1)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 18 2015a(n) = (2^(n^2 + n - 1/24)*A^(3/2)*Pi^(-n/2 - 1/4)*BarnesG(n + 3/2))/(e^(1/8)*BarnesG(n + 2)), where A is the Glaisher-Kinkelin constant (A074962), BarnesG is the Barnes G-function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Sep 18 2015a(n) ~ A^(3/2) * 2^(n^2 + n - 7/24) * exp(n/2 - 1/8) / (Pi^((n+1)/2) * n^(n/2 + 3/8)), where A = A074962 is the Glaisher-Kinkelin constant. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 16 2016
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prod(k=1,n, binomial(2*k, k)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 18 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
